mean_en: "an official group of people who have been given responsibility to control something
sentence: The State Health Care Commission meets once every month to make policy.
sentence_trans: 州立卫生保健委员会每个月都会碰一次头来制定政策。
word_etyma: com共同 + miss送 + ion名词后缀 → 共同选出的人 → commission委员会
